trans-unit.source: Converts colors from one data type to another.
Access this class through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
When converting from a string to a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> the ColorConverter expects the unqualified color name; otherwise, an exception will occur in the conversion process.
For example, you should pass "Blue", not "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" or "Color.Blue", to the <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ColorConverter"></xref> class.
Determines if this converter can convert an object in the given source type to the native type of the converter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
You can use this object to get additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
The type from which you want to convert.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to which you want to convert.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the given object to the converter's native type.

When converting from a string to a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> the <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter> expects the unqualified color name; otherwise, an exception will occur in the conversion process.
For example, you should pass "Blue", not "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" or "Color.Blue", to the <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> that provides a format context.
You can use this object to get additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to represent the color.
The object to convert.
An <xref:System.Object> representing the converted value.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Converts the specified object to another type.
The most common conversion is to or from a string.
A formatter context.
Use this object to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
Always check whether this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Also, properties on the context object may return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to represent the color.
The object to convert.
The type to convert the object to.
An <xref:System.Object> representing the converted value.
destinationtype is .
The conversion cannot be performed.
Retrieves a collection containing a set of standard values for the data type for which this validator is designed.
This will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
A formatter context.
Use this object to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
Always check whether this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Also, properties on the context object may return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A collection containing <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or a standard set of valid values.
The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Determines if this object supports a standard set of values that can be chosen from a list.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> through which additional context can be provided.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.GetStandardValues*> must be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
